attributes.action: The British have voted on the referendum. Stop whining and do your job
attributes.additional_details:
The referendum was clearly dated and discussed.
17,410,742 to leave
16,141,241 to stay
72% of the electorate.
Now do what the British people have told you to do and stop procrastinating and trying to wriggle out of the task.
attributes.background: The British people have voted, over 17 million told you they wanted to leave, more than 1.2 million than to stay. So stop whining and trying to wriggle out of the agreement and do the job that you wanted to do and the British people pay you for.
